entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Pine Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
